page.title: 12SUPERNATURAL _STRANGE THINGS
page.content: In 1974 the first Northleach steam fair was held opposite the old mill. A woman came from Birmingham to sell goods. Somebody told her that nobody lived in ______ cottage for years. She was surprised to see an old man with a deformed arm in the back garden. Locals were asked if they knew anyone like that. They said "You must mean old _______, but he's been dead for 25 years _he used to live in the old cottage!" The same year a man was going along the A40 road in his car, when he saw a hippy thumbing a lift. He didn't stop for him, but for some strange reason the hippy walked out in front of his car. The man in the car felt no impact and when he went to to see if he was dead, there was no trace of the hippy.
